title: F.R.I.E.N.D.S
description: A crime drama series about a 40-year-old man who becomes the oldest rookie in the Los Angeles police force.

title: Squid Game
description: A cult classic sitcom about six friends in New York navigating life, love, and everyday challenges.

title: The Rookie
description: A South Korean thriller where desperate individuals compete in deadly games for a massive cash prize.
